guests.name: Cyber Shaman
guests.about: A mysterious mystic who controls the electronics around him. His face is hidden under a mask with LED symbols that change based on his mood.

guests.name: Neon Coder
guests.about: An engineer in a coat lined with neon lines. He sets up digital illusions around himself, creating an impression of an unusual reality.

guests.name: Hacker Pilot
